Content.Text:
<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Flik! You're one minute late! Let me see you drop
and do 100 push-ups!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ack! Sorry Gusto! I'll give you some spicy
crackers later to make it up to you.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Spicy? Why didn't you say so? It's all water
under the bridge. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! So, did your investigation here turn up
anything?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's what I've got. Leafy crops and root crops
are the best fit for this area. They'll grow real
well here, mark my word.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fascinating. Keep up the good work.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh hey, it's <MYNAME>. Looks like we meet
again.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>! I'm <BLUE>Gusto</BLUE>!
<PAGE>
I've heard all about you. You're a human, but you
can still see us, right? That's pretty rad.
<PAGE>
Good to meet'cha!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that we know what grows best here, it's
time to be off. You might say that...nature calls!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right, let's race back home at full speed!
C'mon Flik, I'm ready any time!

What an energetic little Nature Sprite. I wonder if
I'll see them again...
